\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{database.auto.arraytypes}
\label{configuration:DatabaseAutoArraytypes}
\ClearAPI
Defines whether ambeth should create array types (e.g. $STRING_ARRAY$, $LONG_ARRAY$) in the database if they do not exist yet. Valid values are "true" and "false".

%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE END
\type{de.osthus.ambeth.persistence.config.PersistenceConfigurationConstants.AutoArrayTypes}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{database.auto.arraytypes}}]
database.auto.arraytypes=true
\end{lstlisting}
